subject: Indian Polity

D_hi.subject: Indian Polity
D_hi.topic: Panchayati Raj aur Nagariya Swasthans (73rd & 74th Amendment)
D_hi.question_en: What is the role of Panchayat Raj institutions in the implementation of 73rd and 74th Amendments in Indian Constitution?
D_hi.question_hi: पंचायत के 73rd और 74th संवतमंती की संवादय
D_hi.A_en: Panchayat Raj institutions play a vital role in the implementation of 73rd and 74th Amendments in Indian Constitution.
D_hi.A_hi: पंचायत के 73rd और 74th संवातमा की संवादय
D_hi.B_en: Panchayat Raj institutions are responsible for the implementation of 73rd and 74th Amendments in Indian Constitution.
D_hi.B_hi: Panchayat Raj institutions are responsible for the implementation of 73rd and 74th Amendments in Indian Constitution.
D_hi.C_en: Panchayat Raj institutions are responsible for the implementation of 73rd and 74th Amendments in Indian Constitution.
D_hi.D_en: Panchayat Raj institutions are responsible for the implementation of 73rd and 74th Amendments in Indian Constitution.
